CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Harmonium
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.label: harmonium
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.description: Harmonium is the god metal of Harmony, known for its volatile instability and unique interactions with Investiture. While powerful, its unpredictable behavior makes it dangerous to handle.
